descriptions.app_description: Provides weekly business insights based on Google Analytics data.

key_features:
📊 Automated Business Insights – Provides weekly analytics-driven insights to improve decision-making.
🔍 Google Analytics Integration – Uses Google Analytics data to track website performance.
⏳ Scheduled Reports – Runs automatically every Monday at 9 AM to deliver fresh insights.
📢 Actionable Recommendations – Offers data-driven suggestions to boost engagement and conversions.
🚀 Telex Integration – Sends insights directly to your Telex channels for seamless notifications.
data.author: cysoft
